item.title: Help me?
item.dc:creator: @owners25 owners25
item.description:
@owners25 wrote:

hello, i m trying add new command, but where is on my client.java i can add new command?
the guy of tutorial said, now go to urs commands and add
if(command.startsWith(“sp”)){
String[] args = command.split(" ");
int idType = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int walk = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
BufferedWriter bww = null;
try {
bww = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“config/autospawn2.cfg”, true));
int a = absX += walk;
int b = absY += walk;
int c = absX -= walk;
int d = absY -= walk;
bww.write(“spawn = “+idType+” “+absX+” “+absY+” “+heightLevel+” “+a+” “+b+” “+c+” “+d+” 1”);
bww.newLine();
bww.flush();
server.npcHandler.newNPC(idType, absX, absY, heightLevel, a, b, c, d, 0, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(idType), true);
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bww != null) try {
bww.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
}
}

      } //end of command

but if i dont know where i put that, please help thanks
